availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas E. England (Marion County, Kentucky, master blacksmith)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, master blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to Maria C. England. Master blacksmith in Lebanon, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed William Jackson as a blacksmith in Lebanon in 1860. Owned one enslaved individual in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon District 1, p. 547.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon District 1.
